did.abstract: Included in this collection : American Ideals by Milton R. Konvitz (4 CDs) ; WTC Forum - 9/21/01 (1 VHS)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Included in this collection : American Ideals by Milton R. Konvitz (4 CDs) ; WTC Forum - 9/21/01 (1 VHS)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Alumni Affairs and Development Audio-Visual Materials #/4289 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
